markdownRemark.excerpt: Lord Jesus, I sit here this morning with a heart that is breaking, knowing that many of your people are in pain and are struggling this day. I know I am not…
markdownRemark.html:
Lord Jesus, I sit here this morning with a heart that is breaking, knowing that many of your people are in pain and are struggling this day. I know I am not alone in my own personal struggles. I am finding a very real center of your peace falling around me, and I pray that same peace for my struggling brothers and sisters.. I know that pain and struggle are a part of this fallen world in which we live. I know that until the day of Your return there will continue to be pain. But I also know that in the midst of that pain and suffering, I see the extended hands of my Savior reaching ours from His heavenly dwelling place, calling to me, and to all who struggle.

excerpt: Prayer for Hard Times – Prayer through Pain allaboutreflections.com

I got this cartoon from an email that a close friend sent.


src: anonymous

I have no idea who made the cartoon – if anyone knows please leave me a message and I’ll change the credits.

frontmatter.title: Stranded in the Wake of Ondoy (Ketsana)
